00028 MAsymSingleFillHists::MAsymSingleFillHists(TDirectory *dir, const AnaFillResult* afr) :

00045 void MAsymSingleFillHists::BookHists()
00046 {
00047    fDir->cd();
00048 
00049    if (fAnaFillResult) {
00050       time_t duration = fabs( fAnaFillResult->GetEndTime() - fAnaFillResult->GetStartTime() );
00051       duration = duration < 3*3600 ? 3*3600 : duration;
00052       fMinTime = -0.10*duration;
00053       fMaxTime =  1.10*duration;
00054    }
00055 
00056    // By polarimeter
00057    PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00058    for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00059    {
00060       BookHistsByPolarimeter(*iPolId);
00061    }
00062 
00063    // By ring
00064    RingIdSetIter iRingId = gRunConfig.fRings.begin();
00065    for ( ; iRingId != gRunConfig.fRings.end(); ++iRingId)
00066    {
00067       BookHistsByRing(*iRingId);
00068    }
00069 
00070    // for quick reference
00071    //fhAsymVsBunchId_X_BLU = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X_" + strDirName + "_BLU"];
00072    //fhAsymVsBunchId_X_YEL = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X_" + strDirName + "_YEL"];
00073 
00074    string   shName;
00075    TH1     *hist;
00076    string   strDirName(fDir->GetName());
00077 
00078    shName = "hExternInfoVsFillTime_" + strDirName;
00079    hist = new TH2C(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 48, fMinTime, fMaxTime, 100, -10, 300);
00080    hist->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00081    hist->SetTitle("; Time in Fill, hours; ;");
00082    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(3600*6, "gmt");
00083    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "gmt");
00084    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00085    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%H");
00086    hist->SetNdivisions((Int_t) fMaxTime/3600 + 1, "X");
00087    o[shName] = hist;
00088 }

00092 void MAsymSingleFillHists::BookHistsByPolarimeter(EPolarimeterId polId)
00093 {
00094    char     hName[256];
00095    string   shName;
00096    TH1     *hist;
00097    string   sPolId = RunConfig::AsString(polId);
00098    Color_t  color  = RunConfig::AsColor(polId);
00099    string   strDirName(fDir->GetName()); // Get a unique dir name which should be also the same as the fill number
00100 
00101    TAttMarker styleMarker;
00102    styleMarker.SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00103    styleMarker.SetMarkerSize(3);
00104    styleMarker.SetMarkerColor(color);
00105 
00106    // Asymmetry
00107    sprintf(hName, "grAsymVsEnergy");
00108    TGraphErrors *grAsymVsEnergy = new TGraphErrors();
00109    grAsymVsEnergy->SetName(hName);
00110    grAsymVsEnergy->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00111    grAsymVsEnergy->SetMarkerSize(1);
00112    grAsymVsEnergy->SetMarkerColor(color);
00113 
00114    // Analyzing power
00115    sprintf(hName, "grAnaPowerVsEnergy");
00116    TGraphErrors *grAnaPowerVsEnergy = new TGraphErrors();
00117    grAnaPowerVsEnergy->SetName(hName);
00118    grAnaPowerVsEnergy->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00119    grAnaPowerVsEnergy->SetMarkerSize(1);
00120    grAnaPowerVsEnergy->SetMarkerColor(color);
00121 
00122    sprintf(hName, "hAnaPowerVsEnergyBinned_%s_%s", strDirName.c_str(), sPolId.c_str());
00123    Float_t energyBins[10] = {0, 14, 34, 90, 110, 240, 260, 390, 410, 450};
00124    o[hName] = new TH1F(hName, hName, 9, energyBins);
00125    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(0.01, 0.02);
00126    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle(";Beam Energy;A_{N};");
00127    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00128    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetMarkerSize(1);
00129    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetMarkerColor(color);
00130    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetOption("hist NOIMG");
00131    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grAnaPowerVsEnergy, "p");
00132 
00133    // Polarization
00134    shName = "hPolarVsFillTime_" + strDirName + "_" + sPolId;
00135    hist = new TH2C(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 12, fMinTime, fMaxTime, 100, 0, 100);
00136    hist->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00137    hist->SetTitle("; Time in Fill, hours; Polarization, %;");
00138    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "local");
00139    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(3600*6, "gmt");
00140    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "gmt");
00141    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00142    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%H");
00143    hist->SetNdivisions((Int_t) fMaxTime/3600 + 1, "X");
00144    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00145    o[shName] = hist;
00146 
00147    // Polarization profile
00148    shName = "hRVsFillTime_" + strDirName + "_" + sPolId;
00149    hist = new TH2C(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 12, fMinTime, fMaxTime, 100, 0, 1);
00150    hist->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00151    hist->SetTitle("; Time in Fill, hours; Pol. Profile R;");
00152    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "local");
00153    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(3600*6, "gmt");
00154    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "gmt");
00155    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00156    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%H");
00157    hist->SetNdivisions((Int_t) fMaxTime/3600 + 1, "X");
00158    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00159    o[shName] = hist;
00160 }

00164 void MAsymSingleFillHists::BookHistsByRing(ERingId ringId)
00165 {
00166    TH1     *hist;
00167    string   shName;
00168    string   sRingId = RunConfig::AsString(ringId);
00169    Color_t  color   = RunConfig::AsColor(ringId);
00170 
00171    TAttMarker styleMarker;
00172    styleMarker.SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00173    styleMarker.SetMarkerSize(2);
00174    styleMarker.SetMarkerColor(color);
00175 
00176    string strDirName(fDir->GetName());
00177 
00178    shName = "hIntensVsFillTime_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId;
00179    hist = new TH2C(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 48, fMinTime, fMaxTime, 100, -10, 300);
00180    hist->SetTitle("; Time in Fill, hours; Beam Intensity, x10^{9} Protons;");
00181    hist->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00182    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "local");
00183    //hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(3600*6, "gmt");
00184    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeOffset(0, "gmt");
00185    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeDisplay(1);
00186    hist->GetXaxis()->SetTimeFormat("%H");
00187    hist->SetNdivisions((Int_t) fMaxTime/3600 + 1, "X");
00188    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00189    o[shName] = hist;
00190 
00191    shName = "hAsymVsBunchId_X_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId;
00192    hist = new TH2C(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 1, 0.5, N_BUNCHES+0.5, 1, -0.02, 0.02);
00193    hist->SetTitle("; Bunch Id; X Asymmetry;");
00194    hist->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00195    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00196    o[shName] = hist;
00197 
00198    shName = "hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId;
00199    hist = new TH2C(shName.c_str(), shName.c_str(), 1, 0.5, N_BUNCHES+0.5, 1, -0.02, 0.02);
00200    hist->SetTitle("; Bunch Id; X Asymmetry;");
00201    hist->SetOption("DUMMY GRIDX GRIDY");
00202    styleMarker.Copy(*hist);
00203    o[shName] = hist;
00204 
00205 
00206    SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00207    for (; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
00208    {
00209       string  sSS   = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00210       Color_t color = RunConfig::AsColor(*iSS);
00211 
00212       styleMarker.SetMarkerSize(1);
00213       styleMarker.SetMarkerColor(color);
00214 
00215       // Create graphs for different spin states. X = X45 + X90
00216       TGraphErrors *grAsymVsBunchId_X = new TGraphErrors();
00217       grAsymVsBunchId_X->SetName(string("grAsymVsBunchId_X_" + sSS).c_str());
00218       styleMarker.Copy(*grAsymVsBunchId_X);
00219 
00220       // Add graphs to histos
00221       ((TH1*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grAsymVsBunchId_X, "p");
00222    }
00223 }

00227 void MAsymSingleFillHists::SetSignature(std::string signature)
00228 {
00229    stringstream ssSignature("signature not defined");
00230 
00231    char strAnaTime[25];
00232    time_t currentTime = time(0);
00233    tm *ltime = localtime( &currentTime );
00234    strftime(strAnaTime, 25, "%c", ltime);
00235 
00236    ssSignature << "Fill " << fDir->GetName() << ", Analyzed " << strAnaTime;
00237    ssSignature << ", Version " << gMAsymAnaInfo->fAsymVersion << ", " << gMAsymAnaInfo->fUserGroup.fUser;
00238 
00239    fSignature = ssSignature.str();
00240 }

00248 
00250 void MAsymSingleFillHists::PostFill(AnaFillResult &afr)
00251 {
00252    string strDirName = fDir->GetName();
00253 
00254    // Loop over polarimeters
00255    PolarimeterIdSetIter iPolId = gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.begin();
00256 
00257    for ( ; iPolId != gRunConfig.fPolarimeters.end(); ++iPolId)
00258    {
00259       string sPolId = RunConfig::AsString(*iPolId);
00260 
00261       // Get graph of p-Carbon polar values
00262       TGraphErrors *grPCPolar      = afr.GetPCPolarGraph(*iPolId);
00263       ValErrPair    avrgPCPolar    = afr.GetPCPolar(*iPolId); // unnormalized value
00264       //ValErrPair    avrgPCPolarUnW = afr.GetPCPolarUnW(*iPolId); // unnormalized value
00265 
00266       TH1* hPolarVsFillTime_ = (TH1*) o["hPolarVsFillTime_" + strDirName + "_" + sPolId];
00267 
00268       if (grPCPolar && grPCPolar->GetN() > 0) {
00269 
00270          ((TAttMarker*) hPolarVsFillTime_)->Copy(*grPCPolar);
00271          hPolarVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPCPolar, "p");
00272 
00273          if (avrgPCPolar.second >= 0) {
00274             TLine* avrgLine = new TLine(fMinTime, avrgPCPolar.first*100, fMaxTime, avrgPCPolar.first*100);
00275             avrgLine->SetLineWidth(3);
00276             avrgLine->SetLineColor(hPolarVsFillTime_->GetMarkerColor());
00277             hPolarVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(avrgLine);
00278 
00279             //TLine* avrgLineUnW = new TLine(fMinTime, avrgPCPolarUnW.first, fMaxTime, avrgPCPolarUnW.first);
00280             //avrgLineUnW->SetLineWidth(1);
00282             //hPolarVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(avrgLineUnW);
00283          }
00284       } else
00285          Error("PostFill", "hPolarVsFillTime_ graph is not properly defined in %s", strDirName.c_str());
00286 
00287       // Add injection graph to the histogram
00288       TGraphErrors *grPCPolarInj  = afr.GetPCPolarInjGraph(*iPolId);
00289 
00290       if (grPCPolarInj)
00291       {
00292          ((TAttMarker*) hPolarVsFillTime_)->Copy(*grPCPolarInj);
00293          grPCPolarInj->SetMarkerStyle(34); // full cross marker for injection measurements
00294          hPolarVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPCPolarInj, "p");
00295       } else
00296          Error("PostFill", "hPolarVsFillTime_ graph is not properly defined in %s", strDirName.c_str());
00297 
00298       utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hPolarVsFillTime_, 2);
00299 
00300       // Now deal with pol. profiles
00301       TH1* hRVsFillTime_ = (TH1*) o["hRVsFillTime_" + strDirName + "_" + sPolId];
00302 
00303       TargetOrientSetIter iTgtOrient = gRunConfig.fTargetOrients.begin();
00304 
00305       for ( ; iTgtOrient != gRunConfig.fTargetOrients.end(); ++iTgtOrient)
00306       {
00307          TGraphErrors *grPCPolarR = afr.GetPCProfRGraph(*iPolId, *iTgtOrient);
00308 
00309          if (grPCPolarR && grPCPolarR->GetN() > 0) {
00310             TAttMarker marker = RunConfig::AsMarker(*iTgtOrient, *iPolId);
00311             marker.SetMarkerSize(3);
00312             marker.Copy(*grPCPolarR);
00313             hRVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grPCPolarR, "p");
00314          }
00315       }
00316 
00317       utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hRVsFillTime_, 2);
00318    }
00319 
00320 
00321    TH1* hExternInfoVsFillTime_ = (TH1*) o["hExternInfoVsFillTime_" + strDirName];
00322 
00323    // Loop over rings
00324    RingIdSetIter iRingId = gRunConfig.fRings.begin();
00325 
00326    for ( ; iRingId != gRunConfig.fRings.end(); ++iRingId)
00327    {
00328       ERingId ringId = *iRingId;
00329       string sRingId = RunConfig::AsString(ringId);
00330       Color_t  color = RunConfig::AsColor(ringId);
00331 
00332       TGraphErrors *graphErrs = afr.GetIntensGraph(ringId);
00333 
00334       TH1* hIntensVsFillTime_ = (TH1*) o["hIntensVsFillTime_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId];
00335 
00336       if (graphErrs && graphErrs->GetN() > 0) {
00337          ((TAttMarker*) hIntensVsFillTime_)->Copy(*graphErrs);
00338          graphErrs->SetMarkerSize(0.8);
00339          hIntensVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(graphErrs, "p");
00340          utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hIntensVsFillTime_, 2);
00341       } else
00342          Error("PostFill", "hIntensVsFillTime_ graph is not properly defined in %s", strDirName.c_str());
00343 
00344 
00345       // add external info graphs
00346       graphErrs = afr.GetRotCurStarGraph(ringId);
00347       if (graphErrs) {
00348          graphErrs->SetMarkerSize(1);
00349          graphErrs->SetMarkerStyle(34);
00350          graphErrs->SetMarkerColor(color+2);
00351          hExternInfoVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(graphErrs, "p");
00352       }
00353 
00354       graphErrs = afr.GetRotCurPhenixGraph(ringId);
00355       if (graphErrs) {
00356          graphErrs->SetMarkerSize(1);
00357          graphErrs->SetMarkerStyle(34);
00358          graphErrs->SetMarkerColor(color-2);
00359          hExternInfoVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(graphErrs, "p");
00360       }
00361 
00362       graphErrs = afr.GetSnakeCurGraph(ringId);
00363       if (graphErrs) {
00364          graphErrs->SetMarkerSize(1);
00365          graphErrs->SetMarkerStyle(34);
00366          graphErrs->SetMarkerColor(color);
00367          hExternInfoVsFillTime_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(graphErrs, "p");
00368       }
00369 
00370       // Fit the graphs
00371       TH1* hAsymVsBunchId_X_     = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId];
00372       TH1* hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_ = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_" + strDirName + "_" + sRingId];
00373 
00374       SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00375       for (; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
00376       {
00377          string  sSS   = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00378          Color_t color = RunConfig::AsColor(*iSS);
00379 
00380          string grName = "grAsymVsBunchId_X_" + sSS;
00381          TGraphErrors* grAsymVsBunchId_X_ = (TGraphErrors*) hAsymVsBunchId_X_->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(grName.c_str());
00382 
00383          //grName = "grAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_" + sSS;
00384          //TGraphErrors* grAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_ = (TGraphErrors*) hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(grName.c_str());
00385 
00386          TF1 fitFunc("fitFunc", "[0] + [1]*0");
00387          fitFunc.SetParNames("const", "#sigma_{Y}");
00388          fitFunc.SetLineColor(color);
00389          fitFunc.FixParameter(1, grAsymVsBunchId_X_->GetRMS(2));
00390          grAsymVsBunchId_X_->Fit(&fitFunc);
00391 
00392          TAttMarker styleMarker;
00393          styleMarker.SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00394          styleMarker.SetMarkerSize(1);
00395          styleMarker.SetMarkerColor(color);
00396 
00397          // remove graph for empty bunches. A separate histogram with all spin type graphs can be helpful
00398          if (*iSS != kSPIN_NULL) {
00399             TGraphErrors *grAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_ = (TGraphErrors*) grAsymVsBunchId_X_->Clone();
00400             styleMarker.Copy(*grAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_);
00401             hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_, "p");
00402          }
00403       }
00404 
00405       utils::SetXAxisIntBinsLabels(hAsymVsBunchId_X_, 1, N_BUNCHES);
00406       utils::SetXAxisIntBinsLabels(hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_, 1, N_BUNCHES);
00407 
00408       utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hAsymVsBunchId_X_, 2);
00409       utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hAsymVsBunchId_X_neb_, 2);
00410    }
00411 }
